data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Wilson J. E. M. (2017): Three new species of the killifish genus Melanorivulus from the central Brazilian Cerrado savanna (Cyprinodontiformes, Aplocheilidae). ZooKeys 645: 51-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.645.10920, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.645.10920
